description: This file defines the main React/Qwik component for a Tic Tac Toe game, including game logic, UI components, and styling. It manages game state, handles user interactions, determines the winner, and renders the game board and controls.

classes.name: GameBoard
classes.description: Component rendering the Tic Tac Toe game grid with interactive cells.

classes.name: GameStatus
classes.description: Component displaying the current game status, active player, and winner indicator.

classes.name: StatusDot
classes.description: Visual indicator dot showing current game player or status.

classes.name: Controls
classes.description: Component providing game control buttons for restart and new game.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Function to determine if a player has won the game based on current board state.

methods.name: isBoardFull
methods.description: Function to check if the game board is fully occupied, indicating a draw.

methods.name: cellButtonStyle
methods.description: Helper function returning style string for game cell buttons.
